website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 is a solid choice for a gaming laptop, offering decent gaming performance and portability, with a modular upgrade system that lets you add and swap extras easily.
pros: Dual-GPU system offers solid gaming performance
Modular UltraBay system lets you reconfigure your system as needed
Lenovo's AccuType keyboard is as good as ever, now with glowing red accents
cons: Overall performance is good, but not great

customer_reviews.title: Was great when purchased a year ago, would suggest buying a newer laptop now.
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this laptop a year ago it was great as far as its capabilities were concerned, among everything else. It has thankfully not degraded over the last year but at this point in time I would suggest buying a newer laptop as this will soon be extremely outdated as most companies' PC ports will require a lot more powerful hardware due to the capabilities of current consoles and the lack of interest that most developers have in good PC optimization.
customer_reviews.author: Valentin Kulemin

customer_reviews.title: I have always hated Laptops, and been a desktop fan
customer_reviews.text: I have always hated Laptops, and been a desktop fan.. But wow! this laptop is so in budget and can run very well and the first laptop ive seen that doesnt over heat on me from continous moving.. only problem i would say in my opinion is the keys wear away. Example in gaming i use "W A S D" a lot and the black on the keys has completely rubbed off on them all and they just red lighted keys now. so no more identifying the key
customer_reviews.author: Peter Clapperton

customer_reviews.title: Mid level gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop when it was £660, and at that price it was a steal. I use it for some light gaming such as Smite; 40+ FPS on Ultra settings (Usually 60 but some particle effects make it unstable) League of Legends; 60-100 fps, Ultra settings Dirt2: 45+ FPS ultra settings (with antialiasing and anisotropic filtering on max) Half Life 2 games: 60-130 FPS On Ultra, with AA and AF on Max) Note; you cannot use the dedicated graphics card without mains power, you have to be plugged in. Screen looks great, keyboard feels great with a good layout, touchpad is annoying (very slow movements, difficult to press, highly recommend a high dpi mouse
customer_reviews.author: Vord

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you like gaming and are thinking about a dell alien laptop, get this you will save a few hundred pound and its performance is the best i have ever had from a laptop. Don't like windows 8 that much but the performance of this laptop makes me forgive that this great machine has violated itself with Microsoft's stupidity. you wont regret buying this oh and the light up keypad just makes it all that much more cooler, just hold the Fn key and press space bar to change the level of awesome on how much your keypad lights up ;)
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Grand laptop i had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop was delivered in perfect condition and in working order. The laptop looked great and everything worked fine except the track pad which was buggy and locked up often. I returned it because of this. I would buy this laptop with windows 7 or if ubuntu came on it has standard. Overall it is a good laptop and if it didn't have the track pad issues i would have kept it. Amazon were very quick and professional with the return & refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ieuan

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Y500 - Great but defective
customer_reviews.text: I think this laptop has amazing features such as :- -1080p screen -Great processor -Good graphics -Backlit keybarod But on the downside when i received the laptop it had dead pixels on the screen which frustrated me so i rang up amazon and they were happy to replace it just hope this one doesnt have any dead pixels

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Ideapad Y500 15.6 inch Laptop-Black (Intel Core i7 3630QM, 8Gb RAM
customer_reviews.text: I am not a computer geek so I was expecting this to do what it says on the tin and that is exactly what it does. It is really a nice piece of kit. The back-light keyboard is a definite plus but the whole thing does pick up fingerprints very easily. This is a well priced laptop and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. London

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievabru
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop ive ever owned Previously owned an Alienware M11X and this thing packs seriously more of a punch. Haven't had any issues with it whatsoever so far. Delivery was excellent and the product was undamaged. This laptop can run most of my games on ultra settings and is super fast when i need to use it for anything else, especially uni work. Would definitely recommend. Only one minor problem is that the touch pad can drift slightly when clicking, however it is easy enough to just buy a mouse so this does not devalue the product in any way. Excellent purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for the money
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built machine. 1920x1080 res screen as stated. If you've ever used a trackpad over a substantial amount of time you'll love the one on this laptop. Those saying that it's "floaty" or the cursor moves unexpectedly must be inexperienced with trackpads in general. The gestures incorporated in this one are also fantastic. This is an excellent laptop for its price.. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Ideapad Y500 - An excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this wonderful peace of beauty. I am very pleased with my choice. I recommend this laptop to everybody. The features offered are exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.text: Quite happy with it, runs very quick specially with big games like Skyrim, not lag at all and doesn't give you any annoying sounds.

customer_reviews.title: she loved it
customer_reviews.text: this laptop is truly a multimedia machine, I got this for my girl as a birthday gift, took a while before it arrived. However, amazon was truly professional in the way they sorter the issue i had with the delivery not arriving.Working in retail myself I understand that sometimes things happens which cannot always be controlled. Only was upset I couldn't give her her present on her actual birthday date. very fast I haven't really been able to use it much however, my girl won't let it leave her site. very loud speaker the best you can get, good web cam, excellent, screen for HD Movies.
customer_reviews.author: E.jay E

customer_reviews.title: Good product, annoying touchpad
customer_reviews.text: It is a good laptop although I didn't use it at its maximum capacity. Boots fast, nice Win8 interface, easy to use, very good video and sound quality. The backlit keyboard is very useful when you work at night. The only problem I noticed is the touchpad which is very annoying. Even though I set it up how I wanted, I'm still not satisfied. I don't use a mouse and I really wanted a good touchpad. You can set it up very easy and it has very nice functions, but still is a bit hard to use. Overall, 9+ (scale 1 to 10) for Lenovo fo this product. Stefan
customer_reviews.author: Stefan Zamfirescu

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product knowing that some had issues with the touchpad, however I was happy to find out that the one I had purchased was made after Nov 2012, therefore had the Synaptics pointing device. It works beautifully and the computer is blisteringly fast. Idea for my photography and graphics based work. The I7 crunches data for 3D modelling as well as any laptop could. I could not be more pleased. Not had any issues, Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.author: Olly

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful machine. However......
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop. very good build quality, amazing hardware. This is quite possibly the best gaming laptop under £1000 that you can find. HOWEVER!!! Don't be fooled by the false advertising. One of the main features about this laptop that caught my attention, was the ultrabay removable GPU. I wanted to buy the ultrabay GPU add-on and run it on SLI settings. But after some research, Lenovo confirmed that they have no intentions of bringing any ultrabay add-ons (GPU , HDD or fan) to the UK, even though it is clearly advertised. But to be honest, after all that, it's still amazingly good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many other alternatives this one was the most powerful and surprisingly the best value. Windows 8 takes some getting used to, but i have found no flaws with this machine, other than the ultra bay parts are next to impossible to get in the UK

customer_reviews.text: I used it for one week. It is really worthy on it . The operation systems are so quick. Nice screen and keyboard. However ,the Start of window 8 is a little bit slow. Overall, it is very good honestly recommend it!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice.. work very well.. WINDONS 7

customer_reviews.title: Slow Boot time
customer_reviews.text: Hi there, The laptop spec is good but the only problem is the boot time. After looking into it at the Lenovo forum, this is a common fault ([...]) and no solution have been found to fix it yet. It take me 10 mins to start from shut down and I believe for the price it cost, a better performance is required. It is a shame because it has the right potential to be a decent laptop. Gareth
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

customer_reviews.title: Sleeper hit!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Y500 for 3 months now and I absolutely love it! It's considerably cheaper than other mid-level gaming laptops yet it's also more powerful. Only issue so far have been a slow harddrive, which I plan to upgrade anyway. Highly recommended to anyone looking for a cheap portable gaming rig.

product_meta.title: Lenovo Ideapad Y500 15.6-inch Laptop (8GB RAM, 1TB HDD)
product_meta.description:
The high-performance Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 comes with a striking premium brushed-metal finish. Click here to see a larger image. THE LENOVO IDEAPAD Y500
HIGH PERFORMANCE LAPTOP WITH THE OPTION TO DOUBLE GRAPHICS PERFORMANCE
With a brushed metal exterior and metal speaker grilles the IdeaPad Y500 notebook looks as serious about performance as it is. The 3rd generation Intel Core processor, high-performance graphics and premium audio combine to make this a true multimedia powerhouse. You can add even more with the unique UltraBay feature - an interchangeable bay that can be instantly swapped out for dual graphics capability, increased storage space or an additional fan for cooling.

Powered by a 3rd-gen Intel Core i7 processor, the IdeaPad Y500 will be able to perform the most demanding of tasks. Click here to see a larger image. RESPONSIVE FEATURES
3RD GENERATION INTEL CORE PROCESSOR FAMILY
The Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 features the 3rd generation Intel Core family of processors, including the intelligent Intel Core i7 processor. When top-of-the-line performance is needed for the most demanding of tasks, the Intel Core i7 processor is the ideal choice. This CPU is 15% faster than the previous generation, with the processor, graphics, and memory controller all sitting on one 22nm die.

HIGH DEFINITION NVIDIA GEFORCE GT650M GRAPHICS
Accelerate your notebook's performance by up to 4.5x with the cutting-edge NVIDIA GeForce GT650 graphics card with 2 GB of VRAM*. This powerful graphics adapter will allow you to experience the very best of DirectX 11 gaming, as well as getting the most out of the 15.6" HD widescreen display, giving you Full HD 1080p video playback without stuttering.

You can also enjoy your multimedia on the big screen by using the built-in HDMI port to hook your laptop up to a HDTV, monitor or projector.

The Y500 comes with Lenovo UltraBay technology, allowing you to instantly swap in an additional graphics card or hard drive. Click here to see a larger image. ULTRABAY -- INTERCHANGEABLE BAY
Customising your laptop's performance to suit your needs can be a difficult and expensive process. That's why the IdeaPad Y500 includes Lenovo's innovative UlltraBay technology. UltraBay is an interchangeable bay that can instantly swapped between multiple optional upgrades**, without the need for screwdrivers or accessing the inside of your computer. With UltraBay, you can dial up your performance when necessary, and change back when it's convenient - it's that simple.

Available upgrades include:

 * An optical drive
 * A second discrete graphics card
 * An additional hard drive
 * An additional fan
 * A space- and weight-saving dummy card

There are multiple upgrades available for the UltraBay (upgrades sold separately). Click here to see a larger image. USB 3.0 FOR FASTER CONNECTIONS
By connecting the Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 to a compatible USB 3.0 device, such as an external drive, 3.0 can offer up to 10 times faster transfer rates than standard USB 2.0. This means that files and folders that took hours to transfer now just take minutes and you can move whole albums to and from your laptop in just a few seconds, saving you time and making your media much more portable.

MULTIMEDIA MACHINE
The high-performance Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 comes with a striking premium brushed-metal finish. Click here to see a larger image. 15.6" LED BACKLIT FULL HD DISPLAY
Movies, Games and the Internet all come to life on the Lenovo IdeaPad Y500. Featuring a 15.6" LED-backlit display, you'll be able to enjoy your favourite films and web videos in Full HD resolution (1920 x 1080) and in glorious 16:9 widescreen.

JBL STEREO SPEAKERS
The IdeaPad Y500 comes with two built-in JBL stereo speakers featuring improved speaker design, giving you clearer and richer audio, even from small integrated speakers. The improved speaker design generates better frequency response than typical computer speakers. Special rubber vibration isolators remove unwanted vibrations at low-frequencies, greatly enriching sound quality.

This laptop also includes an S/PDIF port to allow you connect your laptop to your home audio devices and experience lossless digital audio at its finest.

See some of the features available on the Lenovo IdeaPad Y500. Click here to see a larger image. DOLBY HOME THEATER V4
Dolby Home Theater v4 fixes all the problems typically associated with PC audio - tinny sound, weak volume, buzzing and rattling. Experience full-impact surround sound anywhere with Dolby Home Theater v4 on your PC. All the power and nuance of the cinema, all the immediacy of live performance - now from a laptop.

Other benefits include:

See some of the features available on the Lenovo IdeaPad Y500. Click here to see a larger image.  * Conveniently maintains volume level across applications - no more loud surprises when switching applications
 * Experience less audio distortion at higher volumes with the built-in speakers
 * Easily connect your PC to your home theatre system
 * Enhances music, movies and gaming

SIMPLIFIED SOLUTIONS
ALWAYS-ON USB 2.0 CHARGING
The USB 2.0 port is always powered, allowing you to give your phone or MP3 player a much-needed boost even without turning your computer on.

The Intelligent Touchpad allows you to perform intuitive multi-finger commands. Click here to see a larger image. COMFORTABLE HANDLING
METAL COOL-TOUCH COVER AND PALMREST
Designed to perform, the attractive IdeaPad Y500 doesn't just look the part-- you'll find the brushed metal exterior and palmrest are cool to the touch, even when your laptop is being pushed to the limit. Innovative cooling design and materials help make sure this is a notebook which is always comfortable to hold, whilst maintaining a high-performance look and feel.

The backlit AccuType keyboard is stylish, ergonomic, and will help make typing easier. Click here to see a larger image. BACKLIT ACCUTYPE KEYBOARD
The AccuType keyboard you'll find on the Lenovo IdeaPad Y500 is designed with dual layer rounded keys for more comfortable and accurate typing, even in the dark. The finger-friendly curved key shape and ergonomic spacebar will work together to make it easier to type and reduce the number of typos, wherever you find yourself working. Finally, the diamond-cut keypad is the very emphasis of sharp design, giving the whole layout of the IdeaPad Y500 an attractive and pleasing appearance.

INTELLIGENT TOUCHPAD
The one-piece Intelligent Touchpad makes your entire touchpad experience more intuitive. You'll find the freedom to use multi-finger gestures to perform common tasks - whether it's a two-finger movement to rotate an image or a three-finger swipe to move between multiple pages/images.

* Compared to Intel HD 4000 Integrated Graphics.

** UltraBay options sold separately.
